Junpyo

Korean: 준표

Group (2024-present):
NouerA

Introduction

Junpyo is a South Korean singer under Nouer Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group NouerA.

He is best known for being a contestant on the reality survival show MAKE MATE 1.
